name: Nox Apud Operarcanum
description:
It's time for the annual Wizard Opera, when those who see the unseen come out to see and be seen. In this Unplaytested game, Alex, Lara, and guest Monica have created a competitive card game/story game hybrid, in which you are well-dressed wizards at the opera, endeavoring to impress a Very Important Wizard with your arcane fashions. 

Listen to us make this game!

Watch us play this game!

--

Important Note: As you might expect, this game is presented as-is: it's an unplaytested draft, and we have no idea what it will be like in the long-term. You're into strange territory here, proceed at your own risk!
